thread.title: 'The Walking Dead' spoilers: Who is the new character Heath?
thread.title_full: 'The Walking Dead' spoilers: Who is the new character Heath? | Examiner.com

author: Mandy Robinson
title: 'The Walking Dead' spoilers: Who is the new character Heath?
text:
Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images Tonight fans are finally getting a new episode of " The Walking Dead " and fans have one question after watching this show. Who is Heath? On Sunday, Bustle shared all about this new character who is joining the show. If you are a fan of the comic books, then you already know who he is and a bit about him. Corey Hawkins is playing the character of Heath in season 6.
Heath is known in the comics for not talking very much. He is a part of the Alexandria Safe-Zone. Heath is actually going to be someone that people will listen to and he will be a great addition to this cast. Viewers are going to want to get to know more about him without a doubt as soon as they meet Heath. In the comics, Rick helps him to get into the safe zone after going on a supply run. Heath has a relationship in the comic books, so it would be great if another love story is added to the show this season.
Do you want a couple of spoilers about Heath? Well in the comics he is not killed and is actually still alive. Heath also trusts Rick. Not everyone thinks that Rick Grimes is a great guy, but Heath sees the good in him and the two will get along. Wet Paint shared that his friend Scott is injured and that Glenn will end up taking over Scott's job and going out with Heath to help get supplies.
The actor that plays him, Corey Hawkins, is best-known for his movie roles. He was in "Iron Man 3" and the new movie "Straight Outta Compton." Don't miss new episodes of "The Walking Dead" Sunday nights on AMC.
